feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas to separate clauses and phrases.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of vocabulary and grammatical structure.

feature3.explanation: Both texts show a comparable sentence structure and coherence in presenting ideas.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a tone of assertiveness and critical evaluation.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
